TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAccessRule

summary.span: The class is used to represent an access control entry (ACE) in the discretionary access control list (DACL) of an Active Directory Domain Services object.

span.span: The class is used to represent an access control entry (ACE) in the discretionary access control list (DACL) of an Active Directory Domain Services object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스 트러스티, 액세스 제어 형식, 액세스 마스크 및 상속 플래그와 같은 액세스 규칙의 속성을 포함 합니다.The class contains properties of the access rule such as the trustee, access control type, access mask, and inheritance flags. 이러한 종류의 액세스 규칙에 설정 되어 있는 개체입니다.This type of access rule is set on an object. 이후에 개체는 디렉터리 저장소에 커밋되지에 설정 된 규칙에 따라 개체의 보안 설명자를 수정 합니다는 개체입니다.After the object is committed to the directory store, it will modify the security descriptor of the object according to the rules set on the object.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public ReadOnly Property ActiveDirectoryRights As ActiveDirectoryRights

summary.span: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services rights for this access rule.

span.span: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services rights for this access rule.

value.span: 하나 이상의의 조합에서 Active Directory 도메인 서비스를 지정 하는 열거형 값이이 규칙에 포함 된 권한 액세스 합니다.

span.span: A combination of one or more of the enumeration values that specify the Active Directory Domain Services access rights that are included in this rule.

value.span: 중 하나는 이 액세스 규칙의 상속 형식을 지정 하는 열거형 값입니다.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type for this access rule.
